name: RISING PHOENIX: Island Demo 2.0
description:
RISING PHOENIX: Island Demo 2.0

Description

RISING PHOENIX: Island Demo is an upcoming demo of the full game RISING PHOENIX. This demo will showcase many of the games different features such as combat and exploration.

Features

  • Hand drawn pixel graphics, reminiscent of the old 16-bit days.
  • Plays like the final version of the game.
  • Combat Testing
  • Over 8 areas for the player to explore

Credits

A game by Bradley O'Neill

Developed By Celestial Games

Lead Developer, Game Design and Programming: Bradley O'Neill

Marketing, Tester, Design: Syed Aliahsan

Character Artist: Jannette Wu

Rise From Ashes Theme: Cement City

OUT NOW!

UPGRADED TO VERSION 2.0!

Includes new and upgraded features such as new areas and dungeons to explore! And many other new improvements. In-Game Achievements are also now included as promised!
